Apla

Private solutions

In competitive markets with complex business processes, the winner is the one who is able to inspire trust through transparency amongst their partners.

Our mission

Smart implementation of blockchain redefines the trust we place in each other, making interactions more transparent, fair and reliable. This is why we will impact on the World Happiness Index, giving everyone access to knowledge, integrating developing countries into the global economy and  bringing joy to people’s lives.

Leadership

Leadership in innovations makes an impact on a global scale. Multicultural, multidisciplinary and diverse top-management allows Apla to speak in one language with worldwide leaders from prime ministers to CIOs.

Our leaders eat last. Creating a workplace of the future: bureaucracy free, with a greater purpose, based on constant learning and individuality at its core.

Oleg
Strelenko

Founder/CTO
Oleg is an expert in computer sciences with more than 10 years of professional experience in programming and managing IT projects.
Oleg is an expert in computer sciences with more than 10 years of professional experience in programming and managing IT projects. He was leading the team to develop the new coding languages for the blockchain platform called «Symvolio» & «Ptotypo». The team of Apla programmers under the Oleg’s leadership is ready to launch the original blockchain platform after 6 years of hard work. Oleg studied at the Saint - Petersburg State Marine Technical University. He is known in the blockchain community as one of the leading IT professionals.

Latest news

Apla Blockchain Database Transaction Speed: 34,000 tx/s

Following testing, Apla’s blockchain platform has managed to achieve a staggering database transaction speed of 34,000 tx/s. This is by no means the limit. Soon Apla will run much faster. For now, we would like to show you the benchmark database, which is integrating into the platform.

Blockchain Ecosystem: What is it About?

As the spark of blockchain revolution is engulfing the world, the technology is becoming more sophisticated as the day goes by. Blockchain engineers the world over are putting thought into turning their product into an engineering marvel and such ideas give rise to buzzwords of the day. Getting a hold on these buzzwords becomes imperative for C-level execs as well as investors so that the knowledge remains perceptible and nothing becomes arcane.
